mapper.sql: order_id, order_code, member_id, goods_type, goods_num, goods_subtotal, express_fee, order_amount, order_red_packet, order_status, buyer_word, creation_time, recipients, phone, city, detail_address, refund_apply_time, refund_audit_time, send_time, pay_time, wuliuName,wuliuCode,wuliuNumb
mapper.select:
select ord.order_id order_id, ord.order_code order_code, ord.member_id member_id, ord.goods_type goods_type, ord.goods_num goods_num, ord.goods_subtotal goods_subtotal, ord.express_fee express_fee, ord.order_amount order_amount, ord.order_red_packet order_red_packet, ord.order_status order_status, ord.buyer_word buyer_word, ord.creation_time creation_time, ord.recipients recipients, ord.phone phone, ord.city city, ord.detail_address detail_address, ord.refund_apply_time refund_apply_time, ord.refund_audit_time refund_audit_time, ord.send_time send_time, ord.pay_time pay_time, ord.wuliuName wuliuName, ord.wuliuCode wuliuCode, ord.wuliuNumb wuliuNumb, mi.member_name memberName, mi.cellphone cellphone from order_info ord LEFT JOIN member_info mi ON mi.member_id = ord.member_id
and ord.member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ord.order_code like "%" #{orderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} "%" and ord.goods_type = #{goodsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ord.order_status = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ord.order_status not in ('8','9','0')
and mi.member_name like "%" #{memberName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} "%" and mi.cellphone like "%" #{cellphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} "%"
order by ord.creation_time desc
limit #{pageNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into order_info (order_id, order_code, member_id, goods_type, goods_num, goods_subtotal, express_fee, order_amount, order_red_packet, order_status, buyer_word, creation_time, recipients, phone, city, detail_address, refund_apply_time, refund_audit_time, send_time, pay_time, wuliuName,wuliuCode,wuliuNumb) values (#{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsSubtotal,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{expressFee,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{orderAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{orderRedPacket,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buyerWord,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creationTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{recipients,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detailAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{refundApplyTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{refundAuditTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sendTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{payTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{wuliuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wuliuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wuliuNumb,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into order_info
order_id, order_code, member_id, goods_type, goods_num, goods_subtotal, express_fee, order_amount, order_red_packet, order_status, buyer_word, creation_time, recipients, phone, city, detail_address, refund_apply_time, refund_audit_time, send_time, pay_time,
wuliuName, wuliuCode, wuliuNumb,
#{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsSubtotal,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{expressFee,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{orderAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{orderRedPacket,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buyerWord,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creationTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{recipients,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detailAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{refundApplyTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{refundAuditTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sendTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{payTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{wuliuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wuliuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wuliuNumb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update order_info
wuliuName = #{wuliuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wuliuCode = #{wuliuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wuliuNumb = #{wuliuNumb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_code = #{orderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_type = #{goodsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_num = #{goodsNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, goods_subtotal = #{goodsSubtotal,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, express_fee = #{expressFee,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, order_amount = #{orderAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, order_red_packet = #{orderRedPacket,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_status = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, buyer_word = #{buyerWord,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creation_time = #{creationTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, recipients = #{recipients,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, detail_address = #{detailAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, refund_apply_time = #{refundApplyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, refund_audit_time = #{refundAuditTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, send_time = #{sendTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_time = #{payTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update order_info set wuliuName = #{wuliuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wuliuCode = #{wuliuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wuliuNumb = #{wuliuNumb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_code = #{orderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_type = #{goodsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_num = #{goodsNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, goods_subtotal = #{goodsSubtotal,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, express_fee = #{expressFee,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, order_amount = #{orderAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, order_red_packet = #{orderRedPacket,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_status = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, buyer_word = #{buyerWord,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creation_time = #{creationTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, recipients = #{recipients,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, detail_address = #{detailAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, refund_apply_time = #{refundApplyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, refund_audit_time = #{refundAuditTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, send_time = #{sendTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_time = #{payTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
